text: My poslaly vam (O Rashad) do tsiyeyi spilʹnoty, tilʹky tomu shcho my dlya inshykh spilʹnot ranishe. Vy budete deklamuvaty yim shcho my vidkryvayemo do vas, dlya vony disbelieved u naybilʹshomu Dobrozychlyvyy. Skazhitʹ, "Vin miy Lord. Nemaye boha krim Vin. YA stavlyu moyu doviru u Yo yedynomu; yomu ye moya ostatochna dolya
